message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it holds. I would like to propose a price of $7500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

I understand your perspective, Alice. While I respect the value of your product, I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my previous offer. I would like to propose a price of $8000 for the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you $8750. It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
